message.name: ERR_LEGALORDER_FV_ISSUE_DATE_NOT_BE_FUTURE
message.locale: Issue Date must not be future Date.

message.name: ERR_LEGALORDER_XFV_ORDERENDDATE_NOTBE_EARLIER_THAN_ORDEREFFETIVECDATE
message.locale: Order Expected End Date must not be earlier than Order Effective Date.

message.name: ERR_LEGALORDER_XRV_ATLEAST_ONE_PARTICIPANT_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one participant must be selected for a legal action.

message.name: ERR_LEGALORDER_FV_REQUIREMENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Legal Order Requirements must be entered.

message.name: ERR_LEGALORDER_XFV_ORDERENDDATE_NOTBE_EARLIER_THAN_ORDERSTARTDATE
message.locale: Order Expected End Date must not be earlier than Order Issue Date.

message.name: ERR_LA_XFV_ORDER_ISSUE_DATE_MAYNOT_BEFORE_DOB_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: Issue Date must not be before the date of birth of any participant in the Legal Action.

message.name: ERR_LA_XFV_ORDER_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MAYNOT_BEFORE_DOB_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: Effective Date must not be before the date of birth of any participant in the Legal Action.
